items.title: University threatened with legal action after protest at academic's talk
items.description: Prof Alice Sullivan says her talk at the University of Bristol became like a "zombie apocalypse" during the protest.

items.title: Major incident declared over canal sinkhole
items.description: A multi-agency response is under way at the scene in Whitchurch, with the public asked to stay away.

items.title: TV presenter used to dread Christmas Day with her abusive ex
items.description: Weather presenter Ruth Dodsworth says the festive season can be a misery for domestic abuse victims.

items.title: Russian general killed by car bomb in Moscow, officials say
items.description: Fanil Sarvarov was the head of the armed forces' operational training department, Russia's Investigative Committee said.

items.title: Gold price climbs to new record high
items.description: Investors are flocking to precious metals amid geopolitical tensions and with more US interest rate cuts expected.
